summary: About a third of state tax collections come from sales taxes. After the Supreme Court's 2018 Wayfair decision, states could require e-commerce sellers to tax their residents even if the seller didn't have a physical presence there, like a store or a warehouse. We testified about the case's impacts. For example: 45 states and D.C. adopted remote sales tax laws covering such businesses In 2021...
title: Remote Sales Tax: Initial Observations on Effects of States' Expanded Authority
